overview:
Owner of EGS Innovations, Inc. and contract software developer.

A Software Developer and project management consultant experienced in building and managing large scale projects with emphasis on cost and performance. Experience in leading teams through all phases of project and infrastructure technology implementations including cost analysis, planning, testing, integration, implementation, documentation, operational support and maintenance.

Effective team builder and motivator with excellent verbal and written communication skills. Capable and willing to make the correct call in challenging situations.

Experience working with and managing global project teams.

Owner of contract software development company EGS Innovations, Inc.

Website: www.egsinnovations.com
